lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Similar chip sets for ISDN communications are already being sold by a number of companies including INTEL Corp <INTC>, ATT, Rockwell International <ROK> and a joint venture between Northern Telecom LTd <NT> and Motorola Inc <MOT>.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Advanced Micro also said it has signed a licensing agreement with American Telephone and Telegraph Co <T> under which ATT has provided it with certain digital communications specifications.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We have now reached a key point in the development of communications devices that implement a worldwide ISDN standard," said John East, group vice president for Advanced Micro's logic businesses.
